DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate clinical performance Bausch & Lomb investigational Multi-Purpose Solution compare Ciba Vision Multi-Purpose Solution use wearer silicone hydrogel Group IV contact lens .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Clinical Performance Novel Multipurpose Solution
DOC.criteria: Participants must legal age ( least 18 ) date Informed Consent Form ( ICF ) sign capacity provide voluntary informed consent . Participants must habitually use lens care product lens cleaning , disinfect , storage . Participants must wear lens eye lens must manufacture brand . Participants must agree wear study lenses daily wear basis . Participants must able willing comply treatment followup/study procedure . Participants participate drug device clinical investigation within 2 week prior entry study and/or period study participation . Participants systemic disease affect ocular health . Participants use systemic topical medication , Investigator 's opinion , affect ocular physiology lens performance . Participants corneal surgery ( eg , refractive surgery ) . Participants allergic component study care product .
